mapper.sql: id, file_code, file_name, file_info, file_type, file_status, file_level, project_code, create_user_code, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time
mapper.insert: insert into ${fileTabelName}(file_code, file_name, file_info, file_type, file_status, file_level, project_code,create_user_code, create_time) values(#{kf.fileCode},#{kf.fileName},#{kf.fileInfo},#{kf.fileType},#{kf.fileStatus},#{kf.fileLevel},#{kf.projectCode},#{kf.createUserCode},#{kf.createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id ,a.file_code,a.file_name,a.file_info,a.file_type,a.create_time,b.file_permission FROM ${fileTableName} a INNER JOIN kb_file_user b ON a.file_code = b.file_code AND b.user_code = #{userCode} AND a.project_code = #{projectCode}
SELECT count(1) FROM ${fileTableName} a INNER JOIN kb_file_user b ON a.file_code = b.file_code AND b.user_code = #{userCode} AND a.project_code = #{projectCode}
